title: HoP 173 - For the Sake of Argument - Fakhr al-Din al-Razi
itunes:title: HoP 173 - For the Sake of Argument - Fakhr al-Din al-Razi
description: The hugely influential Fakhr al-Dīn al-Rāzī weaves Avicenna and Islamic theology into complex dialectical treatments of time, God, the soul, and ethics.
